headline: Reassessing Pure Storage (PSTG) Valuation After Gartner Leadership Nod and Growing AI Infrastructure Tailwinds
summary: Gartner’s decision to name Pure Storage (PSTG) a technology leader in enterprise storage is giving investors a fresh reason to revisit the stock, especially as AI driven demand reshapes the all flash array market. See our latest analysis for Pure Storage. That recognition lands just as momentum has cooled, with the 90 day share price return at negative 23.6% and the stock now trading at 69.01 dollars. Yet the five year total shareholder return of 190.81 percent still points to a powerful long...
